Title: Relates to net-metering for non-residential customers of electric corporations which own, lease or operate micro-combined heat and power generating equipment
Summary: Expands New York's net metering law by adding non-residential micro-combined heat and power generating equipment systems to the list of currently eligible technologies that can be net metered.
LawCode: Amd ยง66-j, Pub Serv L; amd ยง1020-g, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the public authorities law, in relation to net-metering for non-residential customers of electric corporations which own, lease or operate micro-combined heat and power generating equipment
